mapper.select: SELECT c.level_seq_no fLevel, b.zid fRuleDetailID,b.reward_percent fRate FROM ddb_reward_rule a LEFT JOIN ddb_reward_rule_detail b ON a.zid=b.rule_zid LEFT JOIN ddb_shoreholder_rule c ON c.level_define = b.shoreholder_level_define WHERE a.rule_type=3 AND now()>=a.effective_time AND a.expiry_time > now()

SELECT b.zid zid FROM ddb_reward_rule a LEFT JOIN ddb_reward_rule_detail b ON a.zid=b.rule_zid ANd a.rule_type = b.rule_type WHERE a.rule_type = #{type} AND now()>=a.effective_time AND a.expiry_time > now()

SELECT b.shoreholder_level_define FROM ddb_reward_rule a LEFT JOIN ddb_reward_rule_detail b ON a.rule_type = b.rule_type WHERE a.rule_type = #{ruleType} AND NOW() >= a.effective_time AND a.expiry_time > NOW()
SELECT reward_percent FROM ddb_reward_rule_detail WHERE rule_type = #{ruleType} AND shoreholder_level_define = #{levelDefine}
